post.body: Understood. I figure that I'll throw everyone in there and give them a chance. Can't keep track of many, anyhow.
I cheat with Tweetdeck. Most everyone I lump into the All Tweets window, but winnow out good ones into groups.
If that's wrong, I don't wanna be right.
Two words: Turtle Soup.
140 characters can not convey how much I hate, hate, hate the Wonder Pets. Hate.
Jimbo has had some good stuff lately.
I had that whole 68.116 range banned. I removed the ban, so you should be OK now.
@bhdonovan If you need any help, Beth, I can pitch in as well.
What's the first two quads of your IP?
I had one from Charter, and I think the one that was impersonating some of "the gang," was a Charter addy too.
I'll have a peek at the .htaccess file. I think we ended up having to block a whole swatch of Charter addys due to psycho.
They did get rid of Bryant Gumbel, which is a pretty big improvement. Still have a long ways to go, though.
If it makes you feel any better, I still get stuck watching the Donkeys almost every weekend.
But I also think that the NFL is really shooting themselves by being such buttheads about it.
IIRC, Congress is holding hearings about that travesty, so you can sleep easier knowing that.
Yeah, I ponied up the $2.99/month for the Sports Package, just to get the NFLN. Money well spent.
I dunno. You have a good RFP in there? Those are always titillating.
Pics or it didn't happen.
That would be AWESOME. Love it, Love it, Love it. Not gonna get it, though. We get hosed every time.
Was just asking the Spousal Unit the same question.
I also liked their cover of "Mrs. Robinson."
I've got front row seats for the Jellystone explosion. Should be a hum-dinger, but a little on the short side.
I assume you're still playing Left 4 Dead? Just made that purchase this weekend, and haven't seen the light of day in a while.
Or would it be "No blood for back bacon?"
No back bacon for oil!
@lorihamm Can't you do something about her? Is she off her meds again? (I keed. I keed.)
Not even close. You have to give it a try. Great on just about everything: burgers, popcorn, eggs (of any type).
Bacon Salt is the greatest invention on the face of the earth. @baconsalt. http://www.baconsalt.com
Global warming, dude.
I was just trying to find a silver lining for you. Heh.
Because you're highly motivated and can't wait to take on the day?
Merry Christmas to you and yours, Sean.
@lorihamm Merry Merry to both of you and all of yours as well. We'll be seeing you soon!
I can put in a good word with Ed Kemmick, if you like.
Someone started the self-destruct sequence on the Colts.
Gave the gift of Bacon Salt this year. Converting people one at a time.
Merry Christmas to all of you. This'll do it for me for the day. :)
Kids are vibrating with anticipation, watching "A Christmas Story," and I'm getting dinner prep done. Doesn't get much better than this.
Off to play Santa Claus and wrap the XBox for tomorrow. Probably have to wake up at oh-dark-thirty to put under tree.
Trip to le Mart du Wal turned out to have an element of win: got to visit with @lorihamm for a bit.
